content: no-sew hippopotamus no-sew hippopotamus ©2016 primarily patterns 1 notes ● worked in the round do not join rounds ● total stitches in the round are given in parentheses ● finished size approximately 3 long body materials & tools 15 yards gray worsted weight yarn worked from nose 1 pair 6mm black safety eyes round 1 chain 5 2 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook single_crochet in nxt 2 chain sts 4 stuffing single_crochet in last chain single_crochet in opposite side of middle 2 chain sts 2 single_crochet in 3 5mm e crochet hook 1st chain 12 round 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 abbreviations us notation chain = chain round 3 decrease 2 single_crochet 2 decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 8 double_crochet = double_crochet round 4 increase 2 single_crochet 2 increase 2 single_crochet increase 12 decrease = decrease round 5 single_crochet in each st around 12 increase = increase work one extra single_crochet treat this as new end of the round lp = loop nxt = next round 6 2 single_crochet ear single_crochet increase single_crochet ear 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 15 single_crochet = single_crochet round 7 2 single_crochet increase 5x 20 slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch insert eyes just in front of ears stuff snout yo = yarn over round 8 14 single_crochet leg 3 single_crochet leg single_crochet 20 #x = repeat contents of brackets # times rounds 9-11 single_crochet in each st around 20 round 12 15 single_crochet leg 3 single_crochet leg 20 special stitches ear chain 2 2 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook do not round 13 2 single_crochet decrease 5x 15 work into ear on next round round 14 single_crochet in each st around 15 round 15 single_crochet decrease 5x 10 leg work 5 double_crochet in same st omitting last yo and draw through of each yo draw stuff through all 6 lps on hook round 16 5 decrease 5 chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in nxt chain single_crochet in nxt chain cut yarn thread yarn tail through a stitch in round 16 so hippo tail hangs down finish off no-sew hippopotamus ©2016 primarily patterns 2
